'''Vial of Adeptal Speed'''  an item used to complete a [[furnishing]] immediately.

It can be purchased from the Realm Depot for {{item|Realm Currency|24|x=10}} for a maximum of 5 per day.

The storage cap in the [[Inventory]] is 99.
